add_avatar_url_placeholder: (Optional) https:// - Leave blank to use one on Discord Application
add_invite_url_placeholder: (Optional) http:// or https:// - Must redirect to https://discordapp.com/
add_longdesc_mute: Please insert how to trigger your bot in the long description
add_welcome: Fields marked without (Optional) are mandatory. Optional fields will be automatically filled in with default values.
error_rethinkdb_insert: An error occured while inserting data into RethinkDB
error_rethinkdb_delete: An error occured while deleting data from RethinkDB
error_rethinkdb_update: An error occured while updating data into RethinkDB
error_duplicate_bot: A bot with this ID already exists
error_bot_html_not_found: This bot does not have any associated HTML page.
message_bot_inserted: You successfully added your bot. Your bot will be looked at soon.
footer_licence: This software is licenced under the GPL-3.0 Licence.
index_jumbotron: Welcome to a generic Bootstrap page.
list_jumbotron: This is where promotional material goes. Write about why your clone is much better than the other clones of the same thing.
remove_description: Please select a valid reason to remove this bot. Reasons not listed will have to be voted in.
Give evidence or give extra reasoning
remove_respond_feedback_loop: Bot got involved in a feedback loop
remove_no_documentation: There is no documentation to use the bot with
remove_bot_is_offline: Offline for a prolonged period of time
remove_bot_gained_sentience: The owner is using the bot to communicate
remove_bot_wrong_invite: Invite link does not invite the bot
remove_response_nsfw_outside_nsfw: NSFW messages outside of Discord NSFW channels
remove_discord_against_tos: Against the Discord Developer API Terms of Service and/or the Discord Terms of Service
remove_other_tos: Breaks the Terms of Service of other services it uses
token_description: This token is used to access the Bot List API, whenever it is required. For more information about this API, read the Bot List documentation.
token_missing: You do not have a token
website_comment: This bot list is found on GitHub. Try not to hack us.
website_description: An open source Discord Bot listing website.
